allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial fork setup: documentation and automation scripts

- Added AI assistant rules (CLAUDE.md) with fork strategy
- Created customization tracking system (CUSTOMIZATIONS.md)
- Added fork workflow documentation (FORK-README.md, GIT-WORKFLOW.md)
- Added .env.example template with all available options
- Modified .gitignore to allow .env.example
- Included automation scripts for domain management and deployment

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add custom analytics UI components (Phase 2)

Created 9 isolated React components for custom analytics dashboard:
- MiniChart: Chart.js-based mini chart with multi-metric support
- StatsOverview: Aggregated statistics with large chart
- DomainCard: Compact domain card (154px height) with metrics
- MetricToggle: Toggle buttons for 5 metrics (pageviews/visits/visitors/bounces/avgTime)
- FilterBar: Date range, search, sort, and tag filters
- DomainsGrid: Virtualized grid with react-window (500+ domains support)
- RealtimeIndicator: Live visitor count with pulse animation
- TagManager: Tag creation and management modal
- ExportButton: CSV export utility

All components use TypeScript, CSS Modules, and existing design system.
Components are isolated in src/components/custom/ for minimal merge conflicts.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
